potentially life-threatening condition that occurs when there are blood clots in

the veins. (4)

Changes in menstrual cycle can also occur when birth control medications and

certain antipsychotics, such as risperidone or quetiapine, are combined. This

can include irregular periods, heavy bleeding, or spotting. (5)
